metadata.title: CVE-2022-24986 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description: KDE KCron through 21.12.2 uses a temporary file in /tmp when saving, but reuses the filename during an editing session. Thus, someone watching it be created the first time could potentially intercept the file the following time, enabling that person to run unauthorized commands.

criterions.comment: kcron package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
